name: Re-Enrollment Maze Challenge
description:
Re-enrollment doesn't have to be a maze!  But games are more fun when they have them.  Can you get the lowest time?  

SCENARIO:

The year is almost at an end.  The tests are taken--the quizzes are turned in.  But, you have the itching feeling that you may be forgetting something.  Hmmmmmm.  EGAD!  You forgot to declare your re-enrollment intentions  of RETURNING/NOT RETURNING/OR UNDECIDED!  You race to declare (and hopefully avoid banging your shins and stepping on LEGO pieces in the process!)  Let's see who can symbolically race through the twists and turns the fastest!?  Have fun and hope to see you next year!
